description: Main Flutter application code for an audiobook library app. It includes app initialization, theme setup, main tab view with store, library, and player interfaces, data models, and sample data.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that initializes the app with a shared preferences instance and sets up the app theme and home screen.

classes.name: MainTabView
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the main tab interface with store, library, and player tabs, including library state management and playback position tracking.

classes.name: Audiobook
classes.description: Data model representing an audiobook with id, title, author, cover URL, and total duration.

classes.name: StoreTab
classes.description: UI component displaying a grid of available audiobooks with purchase and open options.

classes.name: LibraryTab
classes.description: UI component displaying a list of purchased audiobooks with progress info.

classes.name: PlayerTab
classes.description: UI component simulating audiobook playback with progress slider and controls.

methods.name: buildCover
methods.description: Builds the cover image widget for each audiobook, handling asset and network images.

methods.name: durationFormat
methods.description: Formats duration in seconds into human-readable string.
